reasoning: Employee costs under Schedule 12 of Audited Accounts map directly to O&M per KSERC Regulation 5.1. Source: Page 14, Table 2, Cell B4.

source_field: Long Term Power Purchase — NTPC Agreement
reasoning: Long-term PPA with NTPC is classified as Uncontrollable per Regulation 4.2. Rate determined by regulator-approved tariff. Source: Page 18, Table 5.

source_field: Short Term Power Purchase — IEX Spot
reasoning: Exchange-based spot purchases are Uncontrollable per Regulation 4.3. Market-driven pricing.
Planned maintenance activities are Controllable operational expenses.
Normative interest calculated at SBI EBLR + 2% per Regulation 6.3. Rate is externally determined.
Fuel costs for generation pass-through per Regulation 4.1. Market-linked pricing.
Transmission O&M activities are Controllable per Regulation 5.2.
Professional fees typically map to O&M, but confidence lower due to potential regulatory nature. RECOMMEND REVIEW.
